text:
Created attachment 25152
Additional stats for htcacheclean

Patch to add extra stats to htcacheclean's '-v' option. Useful if you run multiple cache roots and pipe the output to a log and/or want to ensure you're not killing fresh content.

# ./htcacheclean -Dv -p /path/to/cache_root -l 128M
Cleaned /path/to/cache_root. Statistics:
size limit 128.0M
total size was 190.2M, total size now 127.9M
total entries was 23792, total entries now 16416
7376 entries deleted (2 from future, 7374 expired, 0 fresh)

Unfortunately not that useful if you run daemonized -- perhaps an option to log would be useful for this mode?
creator: mark@markdrayton.info
